name: Recipe: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter.

value.name: Mint
value.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

value.name: Shrimp Meat
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Potato
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Berry
value.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

value.name: Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
value.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. A spread made from potatoes and berries is placed onto crispy potato slices, and a whole shrimp is then added on top. The fragrant and full-bodied flavors serve to whet the appetite, while the addition of Mint adds a whole other dimension to the mix.
